items.tagline: On a mission to make the web more open and programmable.
items.about:
Apify is a full-stack web scraping and browser automation platform that lets you extract data from websites and automate workflows on the web. 

With Apify, you can turn any website into an API!

employees.employee_position: Tvořím junior.guru, které pomáhá juniorním programátorům

#PyConIT2025

How I Use WhatsApp DMs + Website Scraping to Book Calls with Med Spas in Dubai
I’ve been running a direct outreach campaign targeting med spas in Dubai — not using ads or cold email, but smart, personalized WhatsApp DMs.
Here’s the full process — now with website scraping for deeper personalization 🔥👇
✅ Step 1: Scrape Med Spas from Google Maps Using Apify
 I start by collecting:
Spa name
Google rating
One standout customer review
Website link
✅ Step 2: Website Scraping for Real Personalization
 I use lightweight scraping tools to pull specific details from their website, such as:
services 
Founder’s name
Awards or certifications
Blog or latest offer
This gives me extra personalization ammo beyond Google reviews.
✅ Step 3: Customized Message Example
🟣 Business: Sweet Medical Spa and Massage
 🟣 Rating: 38
 🟣 Review:
 "The calming atmosphere melted away my stress... massage was heavenly."
🟣 Website says:
 💡 "Voted Dubai's top choice for full-body stress relief"
🟣 Final Message:
“hi sweet medical spa 🌸
 just read this: ‘the calming atmosphere melted away my stress… massage was heavenly’ — and saw you're voted dubai’s top spot for full-body stress relief. 👏
i’m sure you’re treating your clients like royalty, but your Google Maps rating is still at 38 — this could be quietly holding you back.
we helped ARMONIA boost their visibility and conversions big time — and i believe we can do the same for you.
let’s jump on a quick 30-min zoom call and see what’s possible.
see you soon,
 abdou”
✅ Why This Works
Uses both public review and website-specific info
Feels human, not spammy
Shows respect by doing the homework
Builds trust fast
📌 Pro Tip: If you're doing cold outreach, personalize twice — once from Google reviews, once from the website. The results are night and day.
💬 Want help writing your first 5 personalized outreach messages using scraping? Let’s connect.

Use Apify Scraper for AI Crawling as a native module on Make! 🤖🟣

Extract clean website content in a format optimized for AI models, vector databases, or RAG pipelines.

Here’s how it works:
✔️ Choose the Standard module for speed and ease of use, or go Advanced for full control or complex scraping tasks
✔️ Get Markdown-formatted results ready for LLMs, LangChain, or vector DBs
✔️ Schedule, automate, and scale content extraction with no code needed

Select a module → run it in Make → power up your AI workflows.

Copy-pasting contacts into lead lists one by one? 🧑💻

In one week (May 29, 10 am EST), we’re running a free webinar showing you how to:

Register → https://apify.it/45dScmv🗺️ Still searching Google Maps manually for leads or checking competitors one by one?

Join our free webinar on May 29, 10 am EST, and learn how to:

Led by Karin Pribylová, Lukáš Křivka, and Ondrej Klinovský.

Register here → https://apify.it/45dScmv

In today’s competitive world, staying ahead of your competitors is no longer a luxury—it’s a necessity.

One of our clients, who owns a successful chain of restaurants, came to us with a challenge:
👉 “I need a way to monitor my 4 main competitors' social media activity and online reviews, without doing it manually.”

🎯 Solution? built a powerful automation system – the “Competitor Social Media Analyzer.”

Here’s how it works (and it only required 4 tools):

✅ Make – The backbone of the automation; connects all systems seamlessly

✅ Apify – Scrapes data from Instagram, TikTok, and Google Reviews

✅ CRM – Stores and organizes all collected competitor data for easy access

✅ OpenAI – Analyzes competitor trends/engagement, compares with our brand’s data, and auto-generates a detailed email report with:

> What our competitors are doing
> Their daily engagement performance
> Their top-performing content
> How customers are reacting to their updates
> Actionable insights to help us improve

📬 The result? Every day, the client’s team gets a clear, data-driven competitive analysis email—with zero manual work.

✨ From competitor moves to marketing improvements, all in one place. And yes—this tracks engagement daily.

🔥 Exclusive Offer
In collaboration with Apify, They're offering an exclusive 20% discount on all Apify plans—just for my network.

🔒 Limited to the first 50 people only. Don’t miss it—Comment “Apify” to claim your discount.🎟 

Follow for more incredible AI automation solutions. 🤖

Automated Google Maps Lead Scraper with n8n & Apify.

I built a no-code automation that scrapes business leads (e.g., names, contacts, ratings) from Google Maps using Apify’s API integration. The workflow runs on n8n, automatically filtering and organizing data into a Google Sheet for easy analysis. Saved a client 10 hours/week on manual research and boosted lead generation by 30%. Perfect for marketing teams or small businesses targeting local customers! DM me to set this or a custom workflow to fit your needs up for you.
Tools Used: 
• Apify (data scraping)
• n8n (workflow automation)
• Google Maps (data source)
• Google Sheets (data storage).

Loom Demo:
https://lnkd.in/dr53ybgd

Proud to be part of this year’s #Sifted100. Huge thanks to Sifted for spotlighting Apify among the fastest-growing B2B SaaS startups in DACH & CEE! 🚀The Sifted 100 DACH & CEE Leaderboard spotlights 100 of the region’s fastest-growing startups in 2025. 🌟

The innovation scope is vast, including startups tackling drug discovery, carbon accounting, robotics, digital payments, cybersecurity and supply chains.

Here’s what stood out:
➡️ A full third of the cohort are B2B SaaS companies
➡️ Fintech is the second most dominant category (31 companies)
➡️ 27 companies are profitable, among which, 11 are fintechs
➡️ Recruitment site FRATCH is the leanest by employee count (7 employees).

See which companies are leading the charge — download the report 👉 https://lnkd.in/eryfdepv

#SiftedLeaderboards #Sifted100

🏆 Scraped our way onto the Sifted 100!

Apify is officially one of the fastest-growing startups in DACH & CEE in 2025, landing at #92 on the Sifted 100 leaderboard.
